mapper.insert: insert into node (node_id, address, port, idle_mem_size, total_mem_size, cpu_usage_ratio, "order", create_time, modify_time, deleted) values (#{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idleMemSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalMemSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cpuUsageRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT})

address,

mapper.update:
update node
node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER},
idle_mem_size = #{idleMemSize,jdbcType=BIGINT},
total_mem_size = #{totalMemSize,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cpu_usage_ratio = #{cpuUsageRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
"order" = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update node set node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, idle_mem_size = #{idleMemSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, total_mem_size = #{totalMemSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cpu_usage_ratio = #{cpuUsageRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, "order" = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update node
id = #{updated.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
node_id = #{updated.nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{updated.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
port = #{updated.port,jdbcType=INTEGER},
idle_mem_size = #{updated.idleMemSize,jdbcType=BIGINT},
total_mem_size = #{updated.totalMemSize,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cpu_usage_ratio = #{updated.cpuUsageRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
order = #{updated.order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{updated.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{updated.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{updated.deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where node_id=#{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from node where idle_mem_size > #{minIdleMemSize,jdbcType=BIGINT} and cpu_usage_ratio < #{maxCpuUsageRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by `order` asc limit 1
